snippet: This article, about a 14-year-old boy who was arrested for taking a clock he built to school, has gone viral. Have you heard about it? What is your opinion? What is your reaction to the video in this post?

headline.main: News Q’s | Boy Arrested for a Clock Gets a White House Invitation
